Turret
Creates [item=exotic_matter] from [item=uranium].
Returns crafted items to their raw ingredients.
Builds and maintains a single [color=ff2222]Worker Bot[/color].
Automatically attacks any enemies in range.
Worker Bots:
Assign Worker Bot
Sub
An underwater transport vehicle.\nProduces [tile=gui.oxygen scale=0.5] Oxygen.

Buys and sells items.

Surface
Dive
Fire [size=18][color=ffff88][text=items.{item}]
Sit on [size=18][color=ffff88][text={structure}]
Get off [size=18][color=ffff88][text={vehicle}]
Anti Gravity installed on your [item=suit]! Hold [key=jump] to fly!
Flight Power
How much power flight drains. Each upgrade uses 3 less power per second.
Subway
Gravel
Asphalt
Skyscraper
Building
Truss
Sand
Concrete
Brick
Find the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color]
[text={item}] [color=ffffff]for [/color][text={name}]
Build a [color=ff2222]Worker Bot[/color] in a [color=ff2222][text=structure.worker_bay][/color]
Find [item=boring_blueprint]
I would like to introduce my first sibling, {name}!
[shake=2]I knew this would happen![/shake] AIs are gonna take over all our jobs!
Well, nobody pays us down here, so isn’t that a good thing?
[shake=1]It’s the principle of the matter!
These are [item=blueprint default=Blueprints] for a [color=ff2222][text=structure.boring][/color] that drilled these [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color]!
Unfortunately, the blueprint is singed from laser fire.
If you can find more copies in the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color], I could fill in the missing pieces.
That’s the last missing piece! You can now build [color=ff2222][text=structure.boring][/color]s with the [item=build]!
A [color=ff2222][text=structure.boring][/color] will make mining large tunnels easier and faster.
I’m sure you know what you are doing… but is it really a good idea to flood the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color]?
[shake=2]Congratulations![/shake] You have reached the surface!
It appears the reason we found no signals was because the surface was flooded and everyone drowned. So sad.
Unless you want to drown too, I’d stay close to pockets of breathable air.
You can upgrade how much oxygen your protosuit can store with [item=chip]s.
You can also build a [color=ff2222][text=structure.sub][/color] in the [item=build] to help you explore the surface.
I also unlocked [item=torpedo default=Torpedoes] in the [item=craft] you can fire while riding a [color=ff2222][text=structure.sub][/color] to defend it.
I looked through the computer’s data, and found the location of a [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]!
I marked the location of the [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]. Go towards my smiling face, and you will find it!
Excellent! [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]s can be used to create [item=exotic_matter].
A single piece of [item=exotic_matter] can power a [color=ff2222][text=structure.generator][/color] indefinitely - just change the fuel type of the generator to use it!
The [color=ff2222][text=structure.com][/color] is working! We have a connection to all robots in the city!
Please stop attacking humans! We aren’t your enemy!
[shake=1]Humans…[pause=5] Dangerous…[pause=5] Must eliminate!
Hmm… If only we had a way to make them be FRIENDS…
No! Human [shake=2]FRIEND[/shake]! We all [shake=2]FRIENDS!
[shake=1]FRIEND is Traitor…[pause=5] Must eliminate!
These Bots are out of control! They’d be better off like FRIEND.
That gives me an idea… Let's overwrite their personality with FRIEND!
[shake=2]FRIEND?
[shake=2]FRIEND!
It worked! I call it the FRIEND protocol!
Now that we have a [color=ff2222][text=structure.com][/color], perhaps we should send a Distress Signal to see if there are any survivors out there?
I wonder where the [color=ff2222][text=names.professor][/color] went? The lab seems empty without her...
Added new log to Log List! Hit [key=help] to view.
LOG 1/8 - The new element discovered was strange. It didn’t interact with other matter, and was difficult to experiment with.
LOG 2/8 - We teamed up with an advanced AI institute to try to unravel its mysteries. Who could have guessed what would come of that…
LOG 3/8 - Unlimited energy, faster than light travel? This stuff broke conventional physics. It was like magic.
LOG 4/8 - The race to monopolize [item=exotic_matter] turned allies into enemies, and brought about the largest and most devastating war. Why would we fight over something unlimited?
LOG 5/8 - It was the AI who saved us. They negotiated a cease-fire, disabled the robots of war, and were instrumental in the reconstruction.
LOG 6/8 - We elected AI leaders, and put our trust in them. Everything was going well until the aliens arrived.
LOG 7/8 - We could not defeat them, nor surrender. Some evacuated the planet, and others went underground into bunkers.

LOG 8/8 - I don’t know why the AI turned against us in our hour of need. With the majority of [item=exotic_matter] managed by AI, this might be the last [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color] available to humanity.\n\nI will protect it as long as I can.

I hope those who fled survived somewhere out there. Perhaps they are making a new Earth as we speak. It is the only hope we have left. This planet is doomed. We are doomed. These logs may be all that remain of us if anyone ever returns.
Transportation Network
No More Trains
Boring Machine
Like a Hot Knife
Home Sweet Home
Making Friends
The Full Story
Sharkbot
Automation
Endless Power
I Can Fly
In Distress!
Moneybags
Build 6 [color=ff2222]Teleportals[/color].
Enter the [color=ff2222]Subways[/color].
Build a [color=ff2222]Boring Machine[/color].
Fully upgrade the [item=mine].
Reach the [color=ff2222]Surface[/color].
Meet [color=ff2222]FRIEND[/color].
Read all the logs.
Defeat a [color=ff2222]Drone Sub[/color].
Build a [color=ff2222]Worker Bot[/color].
Have 10 [color=ff2222]Generators[/color] powered by [item=exotic_matter].
Unlock the [item=anti_gravity_upgrade].
Build a [color=ff2222]Com Station[/color].
Obtain 100,000 [tile=gui.coins scale=0.5 ignoreHeight] [color=ff2222]Credits[/color].
FRIEND
Bots
I'd appreciate it if you didn't kill me. Making new bodies isn't free you know!
Oh, hello! I thought all the other teleportals were broken - I’m glad you got one working!
I could really use some help - I’m trying to build a [color=ff2222][text=structure.blueprint_printer][/color] for my lab, but I can’t find an [item=ai_core] anywhere!
How am I supposed to do research in a world with no supply chain and easy access to materials!
I bet we could scavenge some [item=ai_core]s from the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color].
A functioning AI? You must let me have its [item=ai_core]!
Hey! How would you like it if I wanted your squishy organs?
Unfortunately, I need PAI for my [item=suit] to function.
I am very helpful! Watch, I can even add a Locator for the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color]!

You won’t be able to reach the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color] without a stronger [item=mine]. I’d print a [item=blueprint] for you to use, but alas, my [color=ff2222][text=structure.blueprint_printer][/color] is not yet finished.

There should be a [item=blueprint default=Laser Drill Blueprint] near the [color=ff2222][text=map.old_base][/color] somewhere… Try searching the tunnels surrounding the [color=ff2222][text=map.old_base][/color] before heading up to the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color].
My research is at a standstill! I can’t believe I’m living in a world with alien technology and I don’t have the tools to study it!
With the [item=mine] upgraded, we should be able to breach the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color]! Head towards my smiling face, and you should reach it in no time!
I’m detecting lots of [item=ai_core]s in the subway tunnels… but they are unwilling to exchange messages! How rude!
What’s wrong with these bots!? Don’t they know the first rule of robotics!?
I have no issue with you harvesting [shake=2]THEIR[/shake] [item=ai_core]s!
Now that the [color=ff2222][text=structure.blueprint_printer][/color] is functioning, I can start inventing!
Feel free to use the [color=ff2222][text=structure.blueprint_printer][/color] yourself - it can create upgrades for your [item=suit]. It will need [item=ai_core]s however.
I unlocked the ability for [color=ff2222][text=structure.lab][/color]s to create [item=ai_core]s - hopefully that will help!
There also seem to be endless rogue drones in the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color] you could harvest [item=ai_core]s from.
I need some [item=exotic_matter] to continue my research! If you could create some for me, I’d greatly appreciate it!
You need a [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color] to create [item=exotic_matter]. There might still be one intact on the surface...
Have you gotten any [item=exotic_matter] yet? I’ll be sure to share the results of my research if you help!
You have [item=exotic_matter]!? Can I have one? Pretty please?
Thank you! Now I can finally begin studying alien technology!
As thanks, I have designed a way to utilize [item=ai_core]s - [color=ff2222][text=structure.worker_bay][/color]s.
I've always wanted a friend! Would you make a [color=ff2222]Worker Bot[/color] in a [color=ff2222][text=structure.worker_bay][/color] for me?
Awww… That’s crushing. Let me know if you change your mind…
There’s a [color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color] somewhere in the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color] who sometimes trades with me. You should seek him out when you have the chance!

[color=ff2222][text=structure.worker_bay][/color]s build and manage robots that can work at structures. [color=ff2222][text=structure.turret][/color]s are automated defense structures which can protect your base!
They both require [item=ai_core]s - and you can also use [item=ai_core]s at the [color=ff2222][text=structure.blueprint_printer][/color] in this lab!
If I were you, I’d start stockpiling [item=ai_core]s!
Hello? Are you a survivor too?
[shake=1]Y-yes.[/shake][pause=5] I’m alive.[pause=5] Barely.[pause=5].[pause=5].[pause=5] there was a cave-in.[pause=5].[pause=5].[pause=5] [shake=1]and drones attacked me.
Only here is safe.[pause=5] [shake=1]I stay here.
How do you live here, all alone?
I find things.[pause=5] Sometimes [color=ff2222][text=names.professor][/color] helps.[pause=5] In exchange for [item=ai_core]s.
We’re trying to reach the surface and find other survivors!
The surface.[pause=5].[pause=5].[pause=5] [shake=1]is destroyed.[/shake][pause=5] Flooded.[pause=5] But maybe I can help find survivors underground?
If you can bring me 10 [item=chip]s, I can make a [color=ff2222][text=structure.cryopod] Locator[/color].
Oh. I think you already found all the survivors underground.
But I can improve your [color=ff2222][text=structure.rig][/color]s help you find things…
If you help me find [item=chip]s, I can make a [color=ff2222][text=structure.cryopod] Locator[/color].[pause=5] Maybe.[pause=5].[pause=5].[pause=5] [shake=1]we can find some friends…?
Give 10 [item=chip]s to the [color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color]?
[shake=2]And done![/shake] This should add Locators to all of the [color=ff2222][text=structure.cryopod][/color]s to your [item=suit]!
I can also improve your [color=ff2222][text=structure.rig][/color]s to help them find things…
I…[pause=5] found a [shake=1]friend…
A survivor?
Maybe…[pause=5] I talked to them on my com device…
It’s worth checking out! I added their location as [tile=worker scale=0.25][nbsp]FRIEND in our Locators!
Is there a way to communicate with the aggressive bots in the subways?
They…[pause=5] don’t want to talk. But, maybe with… a strong signal?
I have…[pause=5] blueprints for a [color=ff2222][text=structure.com][/color]. It… might work, but it needs to be built…[pause=5] [shake=2]really high.
And…[pause=5] I’m afraid of heights…
We could build it!
Perhaps…[pause=5] we should talk to the AI… ask them to stop shooting us?
The bots…[pause=5] no longer attack! The Subway…[pause=5] [shake=1]is safe?
We’re FRIENDS now!
Hopefully they’ll remain friends… but if not, I made these Keycards to re-activate the FRIEND protocol.
I can…[pause=5] help you find… things?
[item=coal] is found in [material=cave]…
[item=iron] is found in [material=cave]… and [material=rock]…
[item=gold] is found in [material=cave]… and more commonly in [material=rock]…
[item=diamond]s are found in [material=cave]… and more commonly in [material=rock]…
[item=titanium] is found in [material=rock]…
[item=uranium] is found in [material=rock]…
[item=chromium] is found in [material=sand]… and [color=ff2222][text=structure.chest][/color]s on the [color=ff2222][text=map.surface][/color]…
[item=exotic_matter] can only… be made with a [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color].
The Hunter Bot is trying to communicate - I think it wants a cease-fire.
Don't shoot! I no fight, I am [shake=2]FRIEND!
Why aren’t you attacking me?
I no fight. I am [shake=2]FRIEND!
I like being friends!
But… why are all the other hunter bots firing at me?
They no want to be friends. I think they broke.
Can they be fixed?
If we talk, we can be friends!
They are refusing all communication, but maybe we can bypass that?
[color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color] is friend! Maybe he knows?
I was built to fight. But I prefer being [shake=2]FRIEND!
I have many [shake=2]FRIENDS[/shake] now!
We finally made it back to the surface! It’s a shame what happened to the city…[pause=5] I wonder if it can be rebuilt…?
Seeing the sky again… thank you! I don’t know what I would’ve done stuck underground forever!
Do you know what this city is missing?
Structural integrity?
A restaurant, [shake=2]obviously[/shake]! How can you call it a city when there’s nowhere good to eat!
[shake=4]Aaahh![/shake]
I thought you were a [shake=2]hunter bot!
This city is dangerous… it almost makes me want to go back underground…
I can’t believe you made friends with the bots… does this mean, we can finally have peace?
I just hope those alien spaceships don’t return…
We have access to [item=exotic_matter] again? That’s amazing… although a bit of a shame how difficult [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]s are to use…
I wonder if I could create a tree that grows [item=exotic_matter]…[pause=10] might as well make one that grows money too!

Now that we have [tile=gui.coins scale=0.5 ignoreHeight] [color=ff2222]Credits[/color] again and things to buy in [color=ff2222][text=structure.vending][/color]s, shouldn’t you give us a salary for all the work we do?
[shake=3]Absolutely![/shake] But after deducting your housing and food costs, I compute that you are owed 0 [tile=gui.coins scale=0.5 ignoreHeight] [color=ff2222]Credits[/color].
[shake=1]That doesn’t seem fair…
[color=ff2222]Worker Bot {name} is low on power!
Are you sure you wish to dismantle this bot?
Cannot build: at maximum capacity.
Cannot have more than {count} robots!
The [item=craft] is disabled until PAI thinks you are ready to use it!
I wouldn't uncraft your last [item={item}]!
You must be riding a vehicle to fire a [item={item}].
A [text={vehicle}] cannot fire a [item={item}].
The [text={structure}] must be built at least {height} [if={height}==1|block;blocks] higher.
{item} cannot be sold.
Not enough [tile=gui.coins scale=0.5 ignoreHeight] Credits.
Not enough space above you to get up!
Beep boop. Proceeding to designated work site.
Beep boop. Returning to Worker Bay to recharge.
ERROR: Unable to reach designated work site!
ERROR: Unable to reach Worker Bay!
ERROR: Battery levels critically low!
ERROR: Not assigned to any Worker Bay!
WARNING: Worker Bay is out of power!
Beep boop. Operating designated work site.
Beep boop. All systems functional.
Log List
You need to upgrade your [item=mine] to reach the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color].

Let's scavenge [item=ai_core]s from the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color] so we can build a [color=ff2222][text=structure.blueprint_printer][/color] for the [color=ff2222][text=names.professor][/color]!
The [color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color] offered to make a [color=ff2222][text=structure.cryopod] Locator[/color] to find survivors for 10 [item=chip]s!
I think the [color=ff2222][text=names.professor][/color] has something she'd like to tell you!
I'm sure the [color=ff2222][text=names.professor][/color] would appreciate some [item=exotic_matter]!
I think the [color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color] has something they'd like to tell you!
We should find this [tile=worker scale=0.25][nbsp]FRIEND the [color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color] mentioned. I added them to our Locators.
The [color=ff2222][text=names.scavenger][/color] may know a way to contact the bots and make them FRIENDS!
Lets make some [item=exotic_matter] in [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]s!
We should build a [color=ff2222][text=structure.com][/color] - look for the tallest skyscraper, and try building it at the top, placing blocks with the [item=shovel] if needed.
Lets send a Distress Signal at the [color=ff2222][text=structure.com][/color]!

The [color=ff2222][text=structure.recycler][/color] lets you turn crafted materials back into raw materials. This is perfect if you craft too much of an item, or find an item that would be more useful as raw materials.
The [color=ff2222][text=structure.turret][/color] is straightforward - it has a rapid-fire laser attack that hits any hostile forces in range.
The dome will open when it is enabled, and close when it is disabled.
[color=ff2222][text=structure.vending][/color]s let you exchange items for [tile=gui.coins scale=0.5 ignoreHeight] Credits, and buy new items with [tile=gui.coins scale=0.5 ignoreHeight] Credits.

[color=ff2222][text=structure.vending][/color]s restock often - and restocking will always add to their stock, never remove (unless they are full). So, you can usually buy back an item you sold earlier.

[color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]s turn [item=uranium] into [item=exotic_matter]. They take time and 30 [tile=power scale=0.25 ignoreHeight] Power (requiring 2 [color=ff2222][text=structure.generator][/color]s dedicated to a single [color=ff2222][text=structure.particle_accelerator][/color]), but it is worth it for [item=exotic_matter].

[color=ff2222][text=structure.worker_bay][/color]s let you build and manage a single [color=ff2222][text=npc.worker_bot][/color]. [color=ff2222][text=npc.worker_bot][/color]s are able to accomplish all the tasks a survivor can, but require neither food nor oxygen. They are the perfect friends!
They can even be dismantled if you no longer need them.
[item=drain]s
[item=drain]s remove water up to 3 tiles above them, and keep water from flowing into them. They are great for creating a small patch of breathable air and keeping water out of bases.
They require no power, but they can connect structures like [item=belt]s and [item=cable]s.
Vehicles

[color=ff2222][text=structure.sub][/color]s allow you to move efficiently in all 3 dimensions underwater (use [key=rotate_left] to Surface and [key=rotate_right] to Dive as long as your selected tool is not overriding these).
They produce infinite [tile=gui.oxygen scale=0.5] Oxygen inside, and can fire [item=torpedo default=Torpedoes]! Normal tools can also be used from inside the sub, making them very useful underwater.
[color=ff2222][text=structure.boring][/color]s can dig by moving their drill head into walls. They can dig large tunnels, and work indefinitely without requiring extra power.
If you need to expand your underground base, [color=ff2222][text=structure.boring][/color]s are the way to go!
The [color=ff2222][text=names.professor][/color] said there was someone living in the [color=ff2222][text=map.subway][/color] - I wonder if we could find them...?
